A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I give it only one star.
1. Visually appealing - Good
2.Plot - slow / nothing accomplished / various plot-holes (writing has no military sense)
3.Character growth - non existent
4.Directing - slow and directionless (bad timing with awkward jokes shoved in everywhere) (doesn't understand the SW formula)
5.Bad execution of continuing pre-set plot points (tossed into trash\,
Misunderstanding what made characters beloved in previous films.
*I could go on...*
